author: Emily Ashton
title: The Mayor Of Italy's Worst-Hit City For Coronavirus Is Bringing His Daughters Home From The UK
description: "They are probably more secure here than in England," Bergamo's mayor Giorgio Gori told Sky News. View Entire Post ›
content:
The mayor of Bergamo, the city at the centre of Italy's coronavirus outbreak, is bringing his two student daughters home from England because he believes they will be safer out of the UK.
Giorgio Gori told Sky News he did not understand why the UK government… [+2435 chars]
